function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Search string focusing on contagious diseases could lead to biased results and miss important studies related to other diseases or areas of research.","Impact":"Incomplete understanding of the broader scientific landscape and potential missed opportunities for disease prevention and control.","Mitigation":"Expand the search criteria to include broader terms related to public health and infectious diseases, and incorporate input from multidisciplinary experts.","Technologies":"AI-powered search algorithms that can analyze a wide range of scientific literature and identify relevant studies outside the specified keywords.","People":"Researchers, public health professionals, policymakers","Owner":"Research institutions, government agencies"},{"Description":"Exclusion of nonpeer-reviewed articles and studies in other languages with no English translation might lead to language and publication bias.","Impact":"Limited access to valuable insights and research findings from non-English sources, potentially missing crucial information on disease control and management.","Mitigation":"Utilize translation technologies and collaborate with international research networks to access non-English literature. Consider the inclusion of preprint articles and non-peer-reviewed studies with rigorous review processes.","Technologies":"Translation software, cross-language search algorithms, international research collaboration platforms.","People":"Researchers, language experts, international research organizations","Owner":"Research institutions, international health organizations"},{"Description":"Reliance on AI algorithms for quality assessment may overlook important nuances and context in the evaluation of research articles.","Impact":"Inaccurate assessment of article quality and potential exclusion of scientifically valuable but unconventional studies.","Mitigation":"Combine AI-assisted screening with manual review by subject matter experts to ensure comprehensive evaluation of article quality and relevance.","Technologies":"AI-assisted quality assessment tools, natural language processing for context analysis.","People":"Researchers, subject matter experts, data scientists","Owner":"Research institutions, AI technology developers"}]}
